attributes.action: stay in power as it were you who was voted in not gordon Brown. If Gordon is to become Prime Minister he should be voted in fairly.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The country did not vote Gordon to be prime minister he should not be. its like voting for tony and making me prime minister its not right and a cheat of our votes.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
